name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json build && cat src/styles.css build/main.css > build/styles.css && rm build/main.css && touch build/.hotreload
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
